results.title: Blockchain Development at ETH Denver
results.author: Miguel Ramos
results.description: Took a flight out to Denver to participate at their Ethereum Hackathon and it was incredible. Endless Kombucha fueled my late night frustrations...

results.title: Building a Legal Document Builder
results.author: Miguel Ramos
results.description: It doesn't happen too often but sometimes we need some legal help. Using an online service helps cut down the cost of seeking help from an expensive attorney in cretain occasions.
